snippet.title: Oni: Road to be the Mightiest Oni - 2nd Trailer | PS5 & PS4 Games
snippet.description:
Kisejima: an island paradise inhabited by the souls of ancient demons (oni).
Kuuta, a demon warrior, summons these souls and challenges them to trials.
All in order to defeat Momotaro, who is both human and monster...

Kuuta (sky), a demon, and his partner, Kazemaru (wind): a tale of sky and wind as they embark upon an island quest.
Immerse yourself in the all-encompassing, yet tiny world by up-and-coming creator KENEI DESIGN!

Title: ONI : Road to be the Mightiest Oni
Genre : 3D Action
Console(s): PlayStation®5/PlayStation®4
Release Date: 2022 (scheduled)

©HAYAMA SANGYO, KENEI DESIGN
Licensed to and published by Clouded Leopard Entertainment Inc.
Supported by SHUEISHA, SHUEISHA GAMES
